channel.title: How Do I Change The Password Excryption?
channel.description: I used a Fr33Sc4p3 Base and all the passwords come up like this- 103-390-049-92 and stuff... so how do i change that so it shows the accual letters because when ppl use the ::pass command to change it, it locks them out of their files. Thanks!

item.title: How Do I Change The Password Excryption?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

The password encryption is actually labeled in that source. It’s in client.java.
